Summary Note:
The RM has known Schneider Hagenbuch Gasser since childhood, as their families have been close friends for many years. This long-standing relationship has fostered a deep trust and understanding between them.
Schneider Hagenbuch Gasser is a 54 year old VP of Business Development from Switzerland. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
Family Background: Schneider Hagenbuch Gasser and Chiara have been married since 2002. They are proud parents of 3 children: Brunner, Annina and KÃ¤gi.
Education Background:
Schneider earned his secondary school diploma from Kantonschule Solothurn Solothurn in 1989.
Schneider attended Suffolk University in Geneva and graduated in 1994.
Schneider earned his additionally degree from Franklin University Switzerland in 1997.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 31 years, Schneider Hagenbuch Gasser has established himself as a key player in the industry.
In 1994, Schneider Hagenbuch Gasser started working as a Aerospace Engineer at RUAG Schweiz AG, marking the beginning of his successful career.
He then transitioned to Pilatus Aircraft Ltd. as a Program Manager, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 2001 to 2002.
His tenure as a Director of Operations at SR Technics Switzerland Ltd. from 2003 to 2006 was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
His next role was as a VP of Business Development at SR Technics Switzerland Ltd., where he applied his extensive experience to drive innovation from 2007 till now.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 1500000 CHF.
He has house located in Geneva, worth 2680000 CHF.

In 2009, he received an inheritance of 7050000 CHF from his late grandmother, who was a prominent Stock Trader, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: Based on the information provided, we are excited about the client's financial journey and look forward to supporting him in achieving his financial goals.
